00029 // Some advanced definitions, we don't actually need to know anything about these
00030 // types for SearchState, simply that they exist.
00031 class AbstractConstraint;
00032 class AnyVarRef;
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 class SearchState
00037 {
00038   StateObj* stateObj;
00039   unsigned long long nodes;
00040   AnyVarRef* optimise_var;
00041   DomainInt current_optimise_position;
00042   bool optimise;
00043   
00044   // The variables to print when a solution is found.
00045   vector<vector<AnyVarRef> > print_matrix;
00046   
00047   vector<AbstractConstraint*> constraints;
00048   
00049   vector<set<AbstractConstraint*> > constraints_to_propagate;
00050   
00051 #ifdef DYNAMICTRIGGERS
00052   vector<AbstractConstraint*> dynamic_constraints;
00053 #endif
00054   
00055   long long int solutions;
00056   
00057   bool dynamic_triggers_used;
00058   
00059   bool finished;
00060   bool failed;
00061   jmp_buf g_env;
00062   
00063   TimerClass oldtimer;
00064   
00065   shared_ptr<TupleListContainer> tupleListContainer;
00066 
00067   bool is_locked;
00068   
00069   volatile bool alarm_trigger;
00070   
00071   volatile bool ctrl_c_pressed;
00072     
00073 public:
00074 
00075   vector<vector<AnyVarRef> >& getPrintMatrix()
00076   { return print_matrix; }
00077   
00078   vector<set<AbstractConstraint*> >& getConstraintsToPropagate()
00079   { return constraints_to_propagate; }
00080   
00081   unsigned long long getNodeCount() { return nodes; }
00082   void setNodeCount(unsigned long long _nodes) { nodes = _nodes; }
00083   void incrementNodeCount() { nodes++; }
00084   
00085   AnyVarRef* getOptimiseVar() { return optimise_var; }
00086   void setOptimiseVar(AnyVarRef* _var) { optimise_var = _var; }
00087   
00088   DomainInt getOptimiseValue() { return current_optimise_position; }
00089   void setOptimiseValue(DomainInt optimise_pos) { current_optimise_position = optimise_pos; }
00090   
00091   bool isOptimisationProblem() { return optimise; }
00092   void setOptimisationProblem(bool _optimise) { optimise = _optimise; }
00093   
00094   void addConstraint(AbstractConstraint* c);
00095   vector<AbstractConstraint*>& getConstraintList() { return constraints; }
00096   
00097   void addConstraintMidsearch(AbstractConstraint* c);
00098   void redoFullPropagate(AbstractConstraint* c);
00099   
00100   long long int getSolutionCount() { return solutions; }
00101   void setSolutionCount(long long int _sol) { solutions = _sol; }
00102   void incrementSolutionCount() { solutions++; }
00103   
00104   bool isDynamicTriggersUsed() { return dynamic_triggers_used; }
00105   void setDynamicTriggersUsed(bool b) { dynamic_triggers_used = b; }
00106   
00107   bool isFinished() { return finished; }
00108   void setFinished(bool b) { finished = b; }
00109   
00110   bool isFailed() { return failed; }
00111   void setFailed(bool f) {
00112     failed = f; 
00113   }
00114   // This function is here because a number of pieces of code want a raw reference to the 'failed' variable.
00115   // Long term, this may get removed, but it is added for now to minimise changes while removing global
00116   // variables.
00117   bool* getFailedPtr() { return &failed; }
00118   
00119   TimerClass& getOldTimer() { return oldtimer; }
00120   
00121   
00122   jmp_buf* getJmpBufPtr() { return &g_env; }
00123   
00124   TupleListContainer* getTupleListContainer() { return &*tupleListContainer; }
00125   
00126   void setTupleListContainer(shared_ptr<TupleListContainer> _tupleList) 
00127   { tupleListContainer = _tupleList; }
00128                           
00129   SearchState(StateObj* _stateObj) : stateObj(_stateObj), nodes(0), optimise_var(NULL), 
00130     current_optimise_position(0), optimise(false), constraints_to_propagate(1),
00131     solutions(0), dynamic_triggers_used(false), finished(false), failed(false), 
00132     is_locked(false), alarm_trigger(false), ctrl_c_pressed(false)
00133   {}
00134   
00135   // Must be defined later.
00136   ~SearchState();
00137   
00138   void markLocked()
00139   { is_locked = true; }
00140 
00141   bool isLocked()
00142   { return is_locked; }
00143   
00144   bool isAlarmActivated()
00145   { return alarm_trigger; }
00146 
00147   void clearAlarm()
00148   { alarm_trigger = false; }  
00149   
00150   void setupAlarm()
00151   { activate_trigger(&alarm_trigger);}
00152   
00153   bool isCtrlcPressed()
00154   { return ctrl_c_pressed; }
00155   
00156   void setCtrlcPressed()
00157   { ctrl_c_pressed = true; }
00158   
00159   
00160 };

00164 class SearchOptions
00165 {
00166 public:
00168   bool wdeg_on;
00169 
00171   bool find_generators;
00172 
00174   bool cspcomp;
00175   
00177   bool silent;
00178   
00180   bool dumptree;
00183   long long sollimit;
00186   bool fullpropagate;
00189   bool nocheck;
00191   unsigned long long nodelimit;
00193   bool tableout;
00194   
00196   bool solsoutWrite;
00197 
00199   boost::function< void (StateObj*)> solCallBack;
00200 
00203   bool print_solution;
00204     
00206   clock_t time_limit;
00207   
00210   bool randomise_valvarorder;
00211   
00213   bool parser_verbose;
00214   
00216   string instance_name;
00217   
00218   bool redump;
00219   bool graph;
00220 
00221   // The format of output used (-1 for default)
00222   int outputType;
00223   
00225   bool noTimers;
00226   
00227   SearchOptions() : 
00228     wdeg_on(false), find_generators(false), 
00229     cspcomp(false), silent(false), dumptree(false), sollimit(1), fullpropagate(false), 
00230 #ifdef NO_DEBUG
00231     nocheck(true),
00232 #else
00233     nocheck(false),
00234 #endif
00235     nodelimit(0), tableout(false), solsoutWrite(false), 
00236     print_solution(true), time_limit(0), randomise_valvarorder(false), parser_verbose(false), 
00237     redump(false), graph(false), outputType(-1), noTimers(false)
00238   {}
00239   
00241   void findAllSolutions()
00242   { sollimit = -1; }
00243   
00244   void print(string s)
00245   {
00246     if(!silent)
00247      cout << s; 
00248   }
00249   
00250   void printLine(string s)
00251   { 
00252     if(!silent)
00253     cout << s << endl; 
00254   }
00255 };
